page.title: 17OUR TREE NURSERY & PLANTING
page.content: We have a tree nursery in our school in which for about three years we have been planting lots of young trees. We have a wide variety, including Elder, Beech, Oak, Crack Willow, Ash, Hornbeam, Horse Chestnut, Wild Cherry, Rowan, Alder Buckthorn, Alder, Goat Willow, Hawthorn, Blackthorn, Wych Elm, Silver Birch, Wayfaring, Hazel, Osier, Lime, Aspen, Spindle, Dog Rose, and Bramble. Altogether we have planted about 150 young trees in our field. We are now beginning to be able to collect seed from trees we have planted ourselves. The tree nursery itself is part of the Devon Tree Bank project, which aims to encourage the planting of trees native to this county. The project's "tree lady", Mrs Turner, comes in to help from time to time.
